item.title: 苏里南称石油特许权使用费支付将改善税务部门
item.description: 苏里南财政部长斯坦利-拉格霍巴辛（Stanley Raghoebarsing）表示，政府将只向已在税务系统登记的居民支付石油特许权使用费，以此减少未征税或未受监管的经济部门。【原文：Suriname’s Finance Minister Stanley Raghoebarsing said the government will pay oil royalties only to residents who have registered in the tax system as a way to reduce segments of the economy that aren’t taxed or subject to regulations.】

item.title: 区域性银行开始出现办公楼物业危机
item.description: 写字楼物业价值的下滑正在波及美国各家银行，尤其是较小的贷款机构在其商业房地产账簿中加大了贷款修改的使用力度。【原文：Slumping office property values are rippling through US banks, with smaller lenders in particular ramping up the use of loan modifications in their commercial real estate books.】

item.title: Stonepeak 接近达成凯雷 15 亿欧元收购 Forgital 的交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Stonepeak 公司已达成收购 Forgital 集团的协议。【原文：Stonepeak has reached a deal to acquire Forgital Group, an Italian manufacturer of forged components mainly for the aerospace sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: TikTok 老鹰被选中工作与特朗普的模糊立场形成鲜明对比
item.description: 美国对 TikTok 批评最激烈的一些人将在下一届特朗普政府中担任高级职务，在 TikTok 面临美国禁令之际，为即将上任的总统对这款中国人拥有的流行应用程序的新开放态度提供抗衡力量。【原文：Some of the loudest US critics of TikTok are set to occupy senior roles in the next Trump administration, providing counterweights to the incoming president’s newfound openness to the popular Chinese-owned app as it faces an American ban.】

item.title: 缅怀环球旅行家大卫-邦德曼（David Bonderman）：问与答
item.description: 私募股权投资行业不乏大人物，但很少有人比大卫-邦德曼（David Bonderman）更大人物，他本周去世，享年 82 岁。【原文：The private equity industry has no shortage of outsize characters — but few were bigger than David Bonderman, who died this week at the age of 82.】

item.title: 马克-里奇的前避风港如何让顶级大宗商品交易员接受审判
item.description: 上周，当 Trafigura 集团董事马克-欧文（Mark Irwin）站起来在瑞士刑事法庭上作证时，这代表着世界大宗商品贸易商与他们中许多人的祖国之间关系的关键时刻。【原文：When Trafigura Group director Mark Irwin stood up last week to give evidence in a Swiss criminal court, it represented a pivotal moment in the relationship between the world’s commodity traders and the country that many of them call home.】

item.title: 赞比亚在债务重组交易前向中国支付 8,200 万美元
item.description: 赞比亚财政部表示，赞比亚国家电力公司在与其官方双边债权人达成债务重组协议之前，向中国进出口银行支付了 8200 万美元。【原文：Zambia’s state power utility made an $82 million payment to the Export-Import Bank of China before reaching a debt restructuring deal with its official bilateral creditors, the African nation’s finance ministry said.】

item.title: 购物中心、教育和退休生活的新起点
item.description:
本周我们深入探讨了美国购物中心的命运、老年住房短缺以及当选总统特朗普提高联邦政府效率的计划。【原文：

This week we delved into the fate of US shopping malls, a shortage of senior housing and President-elect Trump’s plans to bring greater efficiency to the federal government.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯首富认为卢布对美元汇率在 100-110 之间 "合理
item.description: 俄罗斯首富弗拉基米尔-波塔宁（Vladimir Potanin）周六表示，1 美元兑 100 至 110 卢布的汇率是 "合理的"，因为它平衡了国家和出口商的利益。【原文：An exchange rate of 100 to 110 rubles per US dollar is “reasonable” as it balances the interests of the state and exporters, Vladimir Potanin, Russia’s richest man, said on Saturday.】

item.title: 为什么中国的 "专制 2.0 "很快就会开始消退？
item.description: 近年来，中国国家主席习近平在与西方的激烈竞争中将自己的国家视为其他国家的榜样，而在唐纳德-特朗普再次上台后，他的政府准备加倍批评美国。【原文：China’s President Xi Jinping in recent years has shopped his nation as a model for others in the great competition with the West, and his government is poised to double down on its criticism of the US after Donald Trump takes office again.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克计划从下周开始就天然气经乌克兰过境问题举行会谈
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）表示，斯洛伐克计划下周就天然气供应的未来以及经乌克兰转运燃料的问题举行谈判。【原文：Slovakia plans to hold negotiations next week over the future of gas supplies as well as transit of the fuel via Ukraine, according to Prime Minister Robert Fico.】

item.title: 描绘全球经济：阿萨德倒台加剧中东动荡
item.description: 巴沙尔-阿萨德政府的倒台为中东增添了新的不稳定因素，土耳其则宣称自己是塑造叙利亚未来的主要参与者。【原文：The toppling of Bashar al-Assad’s government has added a new source of instability in the Middle East, with Turkey asserting itself as the main player in the shaping of Syria’s future.】

item.title: 金融时报》报道：英国暂停养老金审查以帮助企业
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周六报道，英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）搁置了对工作场所养老金的审查，以避免在其 10 月份的预算中提高国家保险缴费引起争议后对英国企业造成进一步的压力。【原文：Chancellor Rachel Reeves has put on hold a review of workplace pensions, seeking to avoid further strain on UK businesses after a contentious hike in national insurance contributions in her October budget, the FT reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国人民银行官员称中国明年将下调利率和存款准备金率
item.description: 21 世纪经济报道》援引中国人民银行研究局局长王一新的话报道称，明年中国将适时下调利率和存款准备金率。【原文：China will cut interest rates and the reserve requirement ratio in a timely manner next year, the 21st Century Business Herald reported, citing Wang Xin, director of the research bureau under the People’s Bank of China.】

item.title: 尼日利亚即将消失的自动取款机留下了一个由代理商填补的现金漏洞
item.description:
中央银行希望提高金融包容性，因此鼓励代理商激增；但监管机构现在担心代理商正在消耗货币体系，并使奈拉进一步脱离其控制

。【原文：

The central bank, looking to increase financial inclusion, encouraged the proliferation of agents — but regulators now fear they are consuming the monetary system and pushing the naira further from their control

】

item.title: 特朗普周五将在 Mar-A-Lago 与苹果公司蒂姆-库克共进晚餐
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五将与苹果公司（Apple Inc.据熟知内情的人士透露，特朗普将于周五会见苹果公司首席执行官蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook），这是当选总统与科技高管一系列会晤中的最新一次。【原文：Donald Trump is meeting with Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook on Friday, according to people familiar with the matter, the latest in a string of meetings between the president-elect and tech executives.】

item.title: Iconiq Growth 在 ServiceTitan IPO 中获得超过 10 亿美元的收益
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，本周科技初创公司 ServiceTitan Inc. 在公开市场的首次亮相为早期投资者带来了巨额回报，其中 Iconiq Growth 获得了超过 10 亿美元的回报，Bessemer Venture Partners 获得了超过 8 亿美元的回报。【原文：This week’s public market debut for tech startup ServiceTitan Inc. brought big windfalls for early investors — including returns of more than $1 billion for Iconiq Growth and over $800 million for Bessemer Venture Partners, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赛勒的微策略公司再次荣登纳斯达克 100 强榜单
item.description: 纳斯达克 100 指数的监管机构周五表示，网络时代的软件制造商微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.软件公司帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：MicroStrategy Inc., the dot-com-era software maker whose metamorphosis into a leveraged bet on Bitcoin has transfixed Wall Street, is joining the Nasdaq 100 Index, the benchmark’s overseer said Friday. Software company Palantir Technologies Inc. and Axon Enterprise Inc., a maker of Tasers and police body cameras, will also be added.】

item.title: 140 亿美元美国交易失败，新日铁的 B 计划成为焦点
item.description: 新日本制铁公司曾对斥资 141 亿美元收购美国钢铁公司寄予厚望。但随着交易现在可能告吹，这家日本最大的钢铁制造商将不得不考虑下一步的快速发展措施。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp. had high hopes for the $14.1 billion takeover of United States Steel Corp. But with the deal now likely to unravel, the biggest Japanese steelmaker will be forced to consider next steps for rapid growth.】

item.title: 不良投资者为巴西零售业合并奠定基础
item.description: 据一位直接了解此事的人士称，巴西资深商人 Nelson Tanure 同意收购杂货连锁店 Dia，并正在向反垄断监管机构咨询将其与竞争对手的连锁店 Pao de Açucar 合并的想法。【原文：Veteran Brazilian businessman Nelson Tanure agreed to acquire grocery chain Dia and is sounding out the antitrust regulator on the idea of merging it with rival chain Pao de Açucar, according to a person with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 勒庞破坏财政赤字计划，穆迪下调法国评级
item.description: 在极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞（Marine Le Pen）因减赤争议推翻法国政府后，穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）下调了法国的信用评级。【原文：France’s credit rating was downgraded Moody’s Ratings after far-right leader Marine Le Pen toppled the country’s government in a dispute over deficit reduction.】

item.title: 德国 "债务制动器 "在选举计划中得到保守党支持
item.description: 德国反对党保守派在一份政纲草案中表示，如果赢得明年的联邦大选，他们将维持宪法规定的借贷限额，并反对欧盟联合发债。【原文：Germany’s opposition conservatives said they’ll maintain the country’s constitutional borrowing limits and oppose joint European Union debt issuance if they win next year’s federal election, according to a draft platform.】

item.title: 中国持续通货紧缩对世界意味着什么？
item.description: 事实证明，中国陷入通货紧缩的漩涡难以收拾。这个世界第二大经济体的物价已连续六个季度下跌，如果再下跌一个季度，将创下上世纪 90 年代末亚洲金融危机时的通货紧缩纪录。【原文：China’s spiral into deflation is proving hard to fix. Prices in the world’s second-biggest economy have fallen for six consecutive quarters, and if they fall for one more quarter, the run would equal a record deflationary streak set in the Asian Financial Crisis in the late 1990s.】

item.title: 对冲基金更加看好汽油市场
item.description: 投机者转而看涨汽油期货，这是八个月来最看涨的一次，因为在明年可能出现供应紧张之前，低价可能会提供一个买入机会。【原文：Speculators turned the most bullish on gasoline futures in eight months, with low prices potentially offering a buying opportunity ahead of possible supply tightness next year.】

item.title: 穆迪因财政和政治风险下调斯洛伐克评级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司将斯洛伐克的主权信用评级下调了一个等级，下调的原因包括对体制挑战和政治风险的担忧。【原文：Slovakia’s sovereign credit score was cut one notch by Moody’s Ratings, which cited concerns over institutional challenges and political risks among reasons for the downgrade.】

item.title: 日间交易者精神在市场最危险的边缘难以扼杀
item.description: 本周，国债收益率连涨五天，终于平息了美国大选后的股市热潮。但市场投机边缘的情况却并非如此，比特币及其蹿红的同类产品不断考验着投机热情的极限。【原文：A five-day runup in Treasury yields finally tamped down the post-election fervor in big US stocks this week. Not so at the market’s speculative edges, where Bitcoin and its memed-up cousins keep testing the limits of speculative zeal.】

item.title: 安防摄像头初创公司 Verkada 正在洽谈 45 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，安防摄像头公司 Verkada Inc. 将以 45 亿美元的估值融资 2 亿美元，比上一轮融资大幅溢价。【原文：Security camera company Verkada Inc. is raising $200 million at a valuation of $4.5 billion, a significant premium over its last funding round, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美联储的 "中性 "利率是多少？为什么重要？
item.description: 中央银行试图通过设定利率水平来管理经济，从而鼓励或抑制购车和建筑项目等活动。这些努力围绕着一个处于中间位置的数字而展开，这个数字就是什么也不做的利率，也被称为中性利率。目前，这是一个重要的指导标准，因为随着大流行病时期的通胀岁月即将结束，发达经济体的货币政策制定者们都在削减利率，但他们并不希望中性利率过高。【原文：Central banks seek to manage economies by setting interest rates at levels that encourage or discourage activities such as car purchases and construction projects. These efforts revolve around a number that’s right in the middle — the rate that does nothing at all, also known as the neutral interest rate. It’s an important guidepost right now because monetary policymakers across advanced economies are cutting rates as the inflationary years of the pandemic period draw to a close, but they’re doi】

item.title: 英国天然气厂在价格飙升期间数小时内赚取数百万美元
item.description: 在本周风力微弱的几个小时内，两座燃气发电站各赚取了超过 100 万英镑（约合 130 万美元）。【原文：A pair of gas-fired power stations earned over £1 million ($1.3 million) each in a handful of hours this week when the wind was barely blowing.】

item.title: 比特币有望创三年多来最长周连胜纪录
item.description: 比特币有望实现连续第七周上涨，因为人们对特朗普政府对加密货币友好的乐观情绪不断升温，这将是三年多来最长的一次连涨。【原文：Bitcoin is on track for a seventh consecutive weekly gain, as growing optimism for a crypto-friendly Trump administration fuels what what would be the longest winning streak in over three years.】
